meanings.definition: A male monarch or emperor, especially one of Russia before 1917.
meanings.sent1: The tzar ruled over the vast Russian empire.
meanings.sent2: The tzar's palace was grand and opulent.
meanings.sent3: The tzar decided to wear his crown to breakfast, much to the amusement of his courtiers.
meanings.sent4: The tzar's power was as vast as the Siberian tundra.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tzar sitting on his throne will forever be etched in history books.

meanings.definition: A person in a position of power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The company's CEO was considered the tzar of the business world.
meanings.sent2: The political tzar made important decisions for the nation.
meanings.sent3: The office tzar declared a mandatory nap time for all employees, causing laughter in the workplace.
meanings.sent4: She was the marketing tzar, weaving persuasive campaigns like a skilled magician.
meanings.sent5: The classroom tzar commanded respect with a single glance.
